name: Meggmorize
description:
This is my third game with the Godot engine, and the second one I make public. Both this and the previous one, Heal 'em up, are submissions to the Godot Wild Jam.

It's not much by any means, but I think it turned out to be a fun little game. I certainly had fun making it!

The rules are simple: catch eggs with your basket, which you control with your mouse. Don't catch two of the same kind! If you do very well, your time will get reduced next time.

Github: https://github.com/pmarkee/Meggmorize
